mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, /* 게시글 id */ c.content, /* 내용 */ c.user_seq, /* 사용자id */ u.user_name, /* 사용자명 */ c.created_at, /* 작성일 */ c.updated_at /* 수정일 */ FROM tcomment c INNER JOIN tuser u ON c.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tcomment(content, board_id, user_seq) VALUES (#{content}, #{boardId}, #{userSeq})
mapper.update: UPDATE tcomment SET content = #{content}, updated_at = now() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
